function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of specificity in achieving energy efficiency","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of official communication","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases in built environments due to close proximity of individuals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Doubts about effectiveness of european green deal egd in addressing climate crisis","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of data sharing for non-clinical trial data in covid-19","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive association between the percentage of aging population and the spread of Covid-19 in certain cities in china","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about blockchain and its potential","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Quarantine failures leading to indoor infection in existing buildings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of cloud-based AI-assisted CT service for detecting Covid-19 pneumonia","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate working environment within living space","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Skewed focus on physical well-being in literature review","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased waste, reduced waste recycling","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for home amenities like pools, waterfronts, and docks may lead to overcrowding and increased contact, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in sharing individual patient-level data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Droplet transmission of infectious agents eg. influenza virus within a 1-2 meter range through respiratory droplets and direct or indirect contact","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aq2: air filtration","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"The use of electric vehicles may contribute to urban sprawl and increased competition with public transport and shared services","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Collaborative data sharing across multiple countries may lead to cross-border legal and regulatory challenges","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increasing urban conflicts and violence due to limited resources and inequalities in provision of services","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Existing criteria do not address virus propagation prevention","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Energy requirements and computational efficiency challenges in healthcare sensors may lead to unreliable monitoring and testing/diagnosis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relying on sensor-only estimation of people flow","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixed-use neighborhoods","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High risk perception not always associated with high preparedness for natural disasters","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate distribution of ventilation leading to inadequate dilution of contaminated air","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 analytics","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of hygiene practices","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate handling of dirty filters during replacement can lead to the spread of biologic particles, including molds, bacteria, and viruses, posing a risk of contamination to individuals involved in maintenance activities","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unreliable early stage estimated number of infected humans due to unknown virus characteristics and rapid interventions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficult integration among different sustainability criteria","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to establish networks of working relationships among individuals, groups, and agencies","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Importation of diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential rt-qPCR contamination during RNA extraction and setup","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Allocation of relief funds to projects not directly related to the epidemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Perceived lack of usefulness of technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of freedom of movement and face-to-face service provision","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential bias in the selected literature","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conditional lockdown based on infection curve threshold","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate natural lighting","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social distancing challenges","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Association of eviction threat with increased stress and weakened immune system","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Energy supply disruption","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of definitive epidemiologic data demonstrating the prevention of HAIs in healthcare facilities by UVGI risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and duplicative efforts","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate outdoor air quality leading to
